revised_title: Erich Hückel: A Pioneering Scientist in Quantum Theory and Molecular Theory
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life and scientific achievements of Erich Hückel, a pioneering scientist in the fields of quantum theory and molecular theory. Hückel is best known for his work on the Debye-Hückel theory of strong electrolytes and his theory of unsaturated and aromatic compounds. His contributions to science have had a lasting impact on the understanding of chemical bond phenomena and the development of quantum chemistry.
